title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\HttpFaultDelay
name: HttpFaultDelay
description:
Specifies the delay introduced by the load balancer before forwarding the request to the backend service as part of fault injection.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.HttpFaultDelay

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.fixed_delay
params.description: Specifies the value of the fixed delay interval.

params.name: data.percentage
params.description: The percentage of traffic for connections, operations, or requests for which a delay is introduced as part of fault injection. The value must be from 0.0 to 100.0 inclusive.

methods.description:
